author: rfscholte
msg: Verify OS version instead of Java version.

When specifying invoker.javaHome, the Java version of the Maven runtime can be different then the script runtime (which still uses the original runtime aka JAVA_HOME). So use OS, which should be stable.

msg: tweak SCRIPT_FILENAME passed to fastcgi backends when a balancer is used.
